data.title: Mehmed Maksudoğlu - Waqf
data.meta_description:
Mehmed Maksudoğlu - Waqf - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document discusses the history and establishment of waqfs (Islamic endowments) during the Ottoman era. Key points include:

1) Orhan Ghazi, the second Ottoman ruler, established the first known waqf in 1324 dedicating land and revenue to support Sufis, the poor, and travelers. 

2) Waqfs were established by both rulers and wealthy individuals to gain religious rewards and ensure property and income for descendants.
